original_text: And then immediately the brethren sent away Paul to go as it were to the sea: but Silas and Timotheus abode there still.
korean_text: 형제들이 곧 바울을 내보내어 바다까지 가게 하되 실라와 디모데는 아직 거기 머물더라

sentences.original_text: And then immediately brethren sent away Paul
to go as it were to the sea:
but Silas and Timotheus abode there still.
